content:encoded:
First up on this week’s Case Closed is The Adam Figg Caper, from The Adventures Of Sam Spade. That story aired October 5, 1947.

(25:07) Our second story comes from Unit 99. We’ll hear Possible Market Burglary, their November 15, 1957, episode.

Download CaseClosed742
